description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，最高军衔为中国人民解放军中将。曾于长春围困战中率部起义，后参与抗美援朝战争。是解放军开国将领中少数未加入中国共产党党籍者之一。
description.en: A Chinese military figure with the highest rank of Lieutenant General in the People's Liberation Army. He led his troops to defect during the Siege of Changchun and later participated in the Korean War. He was one of the few founding generals of the PLA who never joined the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期的云南省，是曾泽生的出生地所在省份。
description.en: Yunnan Province during the Qing Dynasty, the province where Zeng Zesheng was born.

description.zh-cn: 位于云南省的县，是曾泽生的出生地。
description.en: A county in Yunnan Province, the birthplace of Zeng Zesheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，曾泽生的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, the place of Zeng Zesheng's death.

description.zh-cn: 位于昆明的一所中学，曾泽生于1919年考入该校。
description.en: A middle school in Kunming, which Zeng Zesheng was admitted to in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 滇系军阀首领，创办了建国军军士队。
description.en: Leader of the Yunnan clique, founder of the National Construction Army's NCO team.

description.zh-cn: 由唐继尧创办的军事训练单位，曾泽生于1922年考入受训。
description.en: A military training unit founded by Tang Jiyao, where Zeng Zesheng was admitted for training in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 位于云南的军事院校，曾泽生曾在此学习。
description.en: A military academy in Yunnan where Zeng Zesheng studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的著名军事院校，曾泽生于1925年在此担任区队长，次年进入高级班学习。
description.en: A famous military academy during the Republic of China era. Zeng Zesheng served as a district commander here in 1925 and entered the senior class for study the following year.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期的云南地方军队，曾泽生曾于1931年在此担任营长。
description.en: The local army of Yunnan during the Republic of China period, where Zeng Zesheng served as a battalion commander in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间的一场重要战役，曾泽生因在此役中战功卓著而获晋升。
description.en: An important battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Zeng Zesheng was promoted due to his outstanding achievements in this battle.

en: 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 原为龙云的滇系部队，后在长春围困战中由军长曾泽生率领起义，并被改编为中国人民解放军第五十军。
description.en: Originally a unit of Long Yun's Yunnan clique, it defected under the leadership of its commander Zeng Zesheng during the Siege of Changchun and was reorganized into the 50th Corps of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 滇系军阀首领，国民革命军第六十军原为其部队。
description.en: Leader of the Yunnan clique, whose troops included the 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一场战役，期间曾泽生率领国民革命军第六十军起义。
description.en: A battle during the Chinese Civil War, during which Zeng Zesheng led the 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army to defect.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。曾泽生在1949年后加入并被授予中将军衔。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China. Zeng Zesheng joined after 1949 and was awarded the rank of lieutenant general.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第五十军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第五十军
en: 50th Corps of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 由长春起义的原国民革命军第六十军改编而成，曾泽生任军长。
description.en: Reorganized from the former 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army that defected in Changchun, with Zeng Zesheng as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第五十军首任政治部主任。
description.en: The first Director of the Political Department of the 50th Corps of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代在朝鲜半岛爆发的战争，曾泽生率领第五十军参与了此战。
description.en: A war that broke out on the Korean Peninsula in the 1950s, in which Zeng Zesheng led the 50th Corps to participate.

description.zh-cn: 抗美援朝战争期间的一次战役，在此次战役中，曾泽生麾下的陈屏率部率先攻入汉城。
description.en: A campaign during the Korean War, in which Chen Ping, under Zeng Zesheng's command, led his troops to be the first to enter Seoul.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军第五十军149师442团副团长，在抗美援朝第三次战役中率部率先攻入汉城。
description.en: Then deputy commander of the 442nd Regiment, 149th Division, 50th Corps of the PLA, who led his troops to be the first to enter Seoul during the Third Phase Offensive of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 韩国首都，在抗美援朝第三次战役中被中国人民志愿军占领。
description.en: The capital of South Korea, captured by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Third Phase Offensive of the Korean War.

en: Central and Southern Military and Administrative Committee

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的中南地区最高政权机关，曾泽生曾任该委员会委员。
description.en: The highest governing body in the Central and Southern region during the early years of the People's Republic of China. Zeng Zesheng served as a member of this committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，曾泽生曾任其委员。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, where Zeng Zesheng once served as a member.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defence Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1954年至1975年间的国家最高军事领导机构，曾泽生于1954年当选为委员。
description.en: The supreme state military leading organ of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975. Zeng Zesheng was elected as a member in 1954.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一届最高国家权力机关，曾泽生于1954年当选为代表。
description.en: The first highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China. Zeng Zesheng was elected as a delegate in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 授予在解放战争时期参加革命战争有功而无重大过失的人员的勋章。曾泽生于1955年荣获一级解放勋章。
description.en: A medal awarded to personnel who participated in the War of Liberation with meritorious service and without major faults. Zeng Zesheng was awarded the First Class Order of Liberation in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的勋章。曾泽生于1953年获朝鲜授予一级国旗勋章。
description.en: An order of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Zeng Zesheng was awarded the First Class Order of the National Flag by North Korea in 1953.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的社会主义国家。于1953年授予曾泽生一级国旗勋章。
description.en: A socialist state located in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia. It awarded Zeng Zesheng the First Class Order of the National Flag in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生之子。
description.en: Son of Zeng Zesheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的执政党之一，曾泽生曾为其党员。
description.en: One of the ruling parties of the Republic of China, of which Zeng Zesheng was a member.

description.zh-cn: 1912年至1949年间统治中国大陆的政权。曾泽生在1948年前效忠于该政权。
description.en: The regime that ruled mainland China from 1912 to 1949. Zeng Zesheng was loyal to this regime before 1948.

description.zh-cn: 自1949年起统治中国大陆的政权。曾泽生在1949年后效忠于该政权。
description.en: The regime that has ruled mainland China since 1949. Zeng Zesheng was loyal to this regime after 1949.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生出生于清朝时期的云南省永善县。
description.en: Zeng Zesheng was born in Yongshan County, Yunnan Province, during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1919年2月，曾泽生考入位于昆明的云南省立中学。
description.en: In February 1919, Zeng Zesheng was admitted to Yunnan Provincial Middle School in Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生考入的建国军军士队由唐继尧创办。
description.en: The National Construction Army's NCO team, which Zeng Zesheng joined, was founded by Tang Jiyao.

description.zh-cn: 1922年12月，曾泽生考入建国军军士队受训。
description.en: In December 1922, Zeng Zesheng was admitted to the National Construction Army's NCO team for training.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生因在建国军军士队受训期间成绩优秀，被送入云南陆军讲武堂学习。
description.en: Due to his excellent performance during training at the National Construction Army's NCO team, Zeng Zesheng was sent to study at the Yunnan Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1925年任黄埔军校区队长。
description.en: In 1925, he served as a district commander at the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 1926年入黄埔军校高级班学习。
description.en: In 1926, he entered the senior class of the Whampoa Military Academy for study.

position.en: Battalion Commander of the 6th Regiment, 3rd Brigade

description.zh-cn: 1931年2月，曾泽生在滇军第三旅第六团担任营长。
description.en: In February 1931, Zeng Zesheng served as a battalion commander in the 6th Regiment, 3rd Brigade of the Yunnan Army.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生因在台儿庄战役中战功卓著，升任师长。
description.en: Due to his outstanding military achievements in the Battle of Taierzhuang, Zeng Zesheng was promoted to division commander.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，曾泽生升任国民革命军第六十军军长。
description.en: In 1945, Zeng Zesheng was promoted to commander of the 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第六十军是龙云的滇系部队。
description.en: The 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army was a unit of Long Yun's Yunnan clique.

description.zh-cn: 在1948年长春围困战中，曾泽生率领国民革命军第六十军起义。
description.en: During the Siege of Changchun in 1948, Zeng Zesheng led the 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army to defect.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第五十军

description.zh-cn: 1949年1月2日，人民解放军总部宣布将长春起义之原国民革命军第六十军改编为中国人民解放军第五十军。
description.en: On January 2, 1949, the PLA headquarters announced the reorganization of the former 60th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army, which had defected in Changchun, into the 50th Corps of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第五十军

description.zh-cn: 自1949年1月2日国民革命军第六十军被改编为中国人民解放军第五十军起，曾泽生一直担任军长，直至1969年因病离职。
description.en: Since the reorganization of the 60th Corps into the PLA 50th Corps on January 2, 1949, Zeng Zesheng served as its commander until he stepped down due to illness in 1969.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第五十军

description.zh-cn: 徐文烈于1949年1月2日被任命为中国人民解放军第五十军的政治部主任。
description.en: Xu Wenlie was appointed Director of the Political Department of the PLA 50th Corps on January 2, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生率领中国人民解放军第五十军参加了抗美援朝战争的第一至第四次战役。
description.en: Zeng Zesheng led the 50th Corps of the People's Liberation Army to participate in the First through Fourth Phase Offensives of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝第三次战役中，第五十军149师442团副团长陈屏带领一营率先攻入汉城。
description.en: During the Third Phase Offensive of the Korean War, Chen Ping, deputy commander of the 442nd Regiment, 149th Division of the 50th Corps, led a battalion to be the first to break into Seoul.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，曾泽生担任中南军政委员会委员。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Zeng Zesheng served as a member of the Central and Southern Military and Administrative Committee.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，曾泽生担任政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Zeng Zesheng served as a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

description.zh-cn: 1954年，曾泽生当选为中华人民共和国国防委员会委员。
description.en: In 1954, Zeng Zesheng was elected as a member of the National Defence Commission of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1954年，曾泽生当选为第一届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 1954, Zeng Zesheng was elected as a delegate to the 1st National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，中国人民解放军授予曾泽生中将军衔及一级解放勋章。
description.en: In 1955, the People's Liberation Army awarded Zeng Zesheng the rank of Lieutenant General and the First Class Order of Liberation.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 1953年，朝鲜民主主义人民共和国授予曾泽生一级国旗勋章。
description.en: In 1953, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea awarded Zeng Zesheng the First Class Order of the National Flag.

description.zh-cn: 曾强是曾泽生的儿子。
description.en: Zeng Qiang is the son of Zeng Zesheng.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生曾是中国国民党党员。
description.en: Zeng Zesheng was a member of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 曾泽生在1948年率部起义前，效忠于中华民国。
description.en: Before leading his troops to defect in 1948, Zeng Zesheng was loyal to the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 自1949年起，曾泽生为中华人民共和国效力，直至1973年去世。
description.en: From 1949, Zeng Zesheng served the People's Republic of China until his death in 1973.
